HomePage.missionText: Revma is dedicated to supporting teachers with meaningful tools, resources, and community.

StoriesPage.heroSubtitle: Revma is here to support educators with meaningful tools, resources, and real advice from teachers who have worked with Roma students across different communities.
StoriesPage.submitText: If you’re a teacher of Roma students, we’d love to hear your story or advice for others.
StoriesPage.communityCentersText: These centers offer valuable resources and support to teachers working with Roma students.
StoriesPage.ctaText: If you’re a new teacher of Roma students, or simply looking for helpful educational materials and resources to better support your class, we’ve got you covered.
